eelanga eka podi ewunge teliwishan keruwawaya.pradhana dosharopanaya oluwa teliwishanayata hewath sirasa nalikawataya.mulinma mata mathaka widihata lamun teliwishanayata gena aawe jathika rupawahiniyayi.ee muthuhara thulini.inpasu podiwun karana wadasatahan athara janapriya wuye swarnawahiniye hapan padurayi.eya eka eka kalata anugrahakaya anuwa eka eka padurawal bawata pathwuwath anthargathaya wenas nowuyeya.dan aluthen kudawun wisin thawath sindu kiyannata wadasatahanak patangena atha.ee sirasa thulaya.kalin sandahan kala hapan padura thula gayana kerune itha sundara lama githaya.eheth dan wenath madhyayathana walin pimbu panditha podiwun ralak gena sirasada ema wadayama patan gena atha.mata eka prashnayak me sambandhawa atha.eya obala thula athda nathda yanna ma nodani.eya nam "hathara paha wasarata athi athi ekama githaya hansa rajini se da ?"
